title: Bell Ribeiro-Addy – 2020 Comments on Jeremy Corbyn’s Suspension from the Labour Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Bell Ribeiro-Addy, the Labour MP for Streatham, on 30 October 2020.
content:
Solidarity with Jeremy Corbyn.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

His suspension from the Labour Party creates division when we need unity.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

He must be reinstated.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We must come together to fight anti-semitism and all forms of racism & bigotry in our struggle for a better society built on justice & equality.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
